attributes.action: Allow children drinking flavoured water in school
attributes.additional_details: Ask the education secretary and health secretary to promote schools to allow children to drink bootled water, infused water, flavoured water
attributes.background:
Some children are reluctant to or unable to drink tap water
We must encourage hydration, to promote wellbeing and engagement within the school environment

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what drinks to allow in schools are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
